testimonials.name: Hugh Dorey
testimonials.description: The food top quality. The staff attentive and very polite. Good to enjoy food from a different culture.

testimonials.name: David Easton
testimonials.description: Great food and service, staff were knowledgeable about the menu, provided courteous and friendly service. Our first time at this restaurant and we will definitely be returning.

testimonials.name: Carole Lyden
testimonials.description: Love the food in warm friendly surroundings. Recommend the dhall and prawn curry, absolutely delicious.

testimonials.name: Simon Feldman
testimonials.description: Super tasty and very spicy! Nice

testimonials.name: Janine McKibbin
testimonials.description: Friendly service and lovely atmosphere. It is rare to find a restaurant where the dishes and service are so consistent. Delicious food and generous portions. A real findâ€™

testimonials.name: Alma Sa
testimonials.description: I went in late on Monday night and got the dahl to go. It is amazing, so flavorful definitely one of the best I've ever had. The food was ready really quickly and the service was very friendly. I will definitely be back and I'm looking forward to trying the other vegan items on the menu.
